title: Backwards-incompatible changes: Merge branch 'isolate-support-v4-dependency'

Backwards-incompatible changes: Merge branch 'isolate-support-v4-dependency'

title: Modified ValidationManager to initialize lazily.
message:
Modified ValidationManager to initialize lazily.

To increase the coverage of the project, avoiding ValidationManager creation is required for now.
Loading ValidationManager will now happen when FormHelper#validate() or some other methods are called, not on FormHelper class is created.

title: Updated android gradle plugin to 0.10.+ and enabled Jacoco.
message:
Updated android gradle plugin to 0.10.+ and enabled Jacoco.

Use any of the commands below:

    ./gradlew :library:createDebugCoverageReport
    ./gradlew :library:connectedCheck

The reports will be created at `library/build/reports/coverage`.
